alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 13 at 2:50PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts up to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
